text: Oreta perfida is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It was described by William Warren in 1923. It is found in New Guinea, where it is known from Papua.The Hooktips (Drepanidae, Drepaninae) of Papua Indonesia ==References== Category:Moths described in 1923 Category:Drepaninae == External Links == The Papua Insects Foundation
title: Oreta perfida
